name: Minedeeper
description:
Minedeeper is a game about getting as deep into the mine and collecting as many gems along the way as possible.

However, you have to be careful! The descent speeds up the further down you get and on top of that, somebody left dynamite laying around!

Your total score is calculated based off the total depth and the worth of the gems you collected.

Gem value table:

- Sapphire, 20 coins

- Ruby, 15 coins

- Emerald, 10 coins

- Topaz, 5 coins

Move around using either the arrow keys or WASD, pause with P or TAB.

Can you beat the devs' high score?

- korfi - 1789

- Rendow - 5228
